name: Shin Megami Tensei - Devil Survivor 2 Record Breaker
synopsis: Your days are numbered. You're stuck in a world that has been invaded and is on the brink of non-existence. At the same time, you and your friends have gained the ability to summon demons via your cell phone, and with it, a power to fight against fate. The countdown begins; will you be able to save the future of mankind?
